title: Cam Newton, LeBron James, Kevin Durant, AFC QBs
itunes:title: Cam Newton, LeBron James, Kevin Durant, AFC QBs
description:
Colin explains why he feels the media is overreacting to the Patriots signing Cam Newton, why he's defending LeBron James over "The Decision", why he feels Kevin Durant made a huge mistake, and who his top QBs are in the AFC. Guests include Peter Schrager, Lincoln Riley, Brevin Knight, and Rich Ohrnberger.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
